descriptions: I wonder who lives here? They are clearly short on water..
Blood isn't my thing. But we don't always have a choice.
That.. Is a lot of Kumis. Who would of thought, fermented mare's milk could be so tasty!
Ah, Kumis. I think I'm better off not getting drunk right now.
It looks like I know where to go if I get thirsty.
Hm, I wonder what's in here?
Wait a second.. What's this doing here? Kinda sus.
Everyone seems to be running low on resources these days.
Mmm, wild garlic! These are pretty rare!
That's enough dried meat to last a year!
Cheese curds. Won't be running out of that any time soon..
Just a bed. I can sleep here.
It looks like noone has lived here in a long time. Sleeping here will be painful.
A Saxual Tree. Pretty much the only wood you'll find out here in the Gobi.
When I get that feeling, I want Saxual healing.
A Barrel Cactus. They can actually live to over 100 years old.
